tool_description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
title: Spotify Scraper

api_list.name: Download Track Lyrics
api_list.description: This endpoint allows downloading lyrics in different formats. You can also tweak the delay time of lyrics.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Delay time in milliseconds. Defaults to `0`. Negative value is allowed.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: File format. Defaults to `lrc`.

optional_parameters.name: removeNote
optional_parameters.description: Whether to remove lines that only contain a single Eighth Note Emoji (♪). Defaults to `true`.

api_list.name: Download Track Lyrics
api_list.description: This endpoint allows downloading lyrics in different formats. You can also tweak the delay time of lyrics.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Delay time in milliseconds. Defaults to `0`. Negative value is allowed.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: File format. Defaults to `lrc`.

optional_parameters.name: removeNote
optional_parameters.description: Whether to remove lines that only contain a single Eighth Note Emoji (♪). Defaults to `true`.

api_list.name: Get Track Metadata
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a track.

api_list.name: Resolve Short URL
api_list.description: This endpoint resolves a Spotify short URL and returns a corresponding original URL.

api_list.name: Get Playlist Metadata
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a playlist.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for albums, artists, episodes, genres, playlists, podcasts, and users. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Search type. Defaults to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `50`.

api_list.name: Get Artist Overview
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of an artist.

api_list.name: Get Track ID by Name
api_list.description: This is a simplified version of the search endpoint that gets the ID of a track by its name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Track name. It's recommended to append the artist's name to avoid unexpected results.

api_list.name: Download Track on YouTube (3 Quotas)
api_list.description: Provides a solution to download a Spotify track on YouTube and returns URLs of audio files. (Powered by [Youtube Media Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/youtube-media-downloader/). Get a better price by subscribing to and using it directly.)

required_parameters.name: track
required_parameters.description: Track ID, track share URL, track name, or other search term.

optional_parameters.name: candidate
optional_parameters.description: The number of the most related YouTube videos among which a video with the nearest duration will be selected to extract downloadable audio URLs. Defaults to `3`.

api_list.name: Download Track on SoundCloud (3-4 Quotas)
api_list.description: Provides a solution to download a Spotify track on SoundCloud. HQ (4 Quotas) and SQ (3 Quotas) audios. (Tutorial: [How to Use SoundCloud Audio URLs](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-audio-urls)) (Powered by [SoundCloud Scraper](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/). Get a better price by subscribing to and using it directly.)

required_parameters.name: track
required_parameters.description: Track ID, track share URL, track name, or other search term.

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description:
Download quality. Defaults to `sq`.
* **`hq`**: High and standard quality - 4 quotas
* **`sq`**: Standard quality - 3 quotas

The final price depends on the existence of the file of the corresponding quality. For example, if `hq` is requested but the high-quality file does not exist, then the price will be 3 quotas if the standard one exists.

optional_parameters.name: candidate
optional_parameters.description: The number of the most related SoundCloud tracks among which a track with the nearest duration will be selected to generate downloadable audio URLs. Defaults to `3`.

api_list.name: List User Public Playlists
api_list.description: This endpoint lists public playlists of a user. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `200`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

api_list.name: Get User Profile
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches a user's profile.

api_list.name: List User Recently Played Artists
api_list.description: This endpoint lists recently played artists of a user.

api_list.name: List Related Artists
api_list.description: This endpoint lists related artists of an artist.

api_list.name: List Artist Playlists/Featuring/DiscoveredOn
api_list.description: This endpoint lists playlists associated with an artist.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Playlist type. Defaults to `playlist`.

api_list.name: List Artist Albums/Singles/Compilations/AppearsOn
api_list.description: This endpoint lists albums associated with an artist. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`. This argument will be ignored if `type` is `appearsOn`.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Album type. Defaults to `album`. Note that type `appearsOn` doesn't support pagination scraping.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `50`. This argument will be ignored if `type` is `appearsOn`.

api_list.name: List Artist Concerts
api_list.description: This endpoint lists all concerts of an artist.

api_list.name: Get Artist ID by Name
api_list.description: This is a simplified version of the search endpoint that gets the ID of an artist by name.

api_list.name: List Genre Contents
api_list.description: This endpoint lists sub-genres, playlists, podcasts, albums, etc. of a genre. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `50`.

optional_parameters.name: sublimit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items listed in each sub-genre. Defaults to `10`.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to `US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `US`.

api_list.name: List Weekly Top Albums
api_list.description: This endpoint lists weekly top albums at any time and in any country.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: `global` or region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/v1/chart/albums/top"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Top Artists
api_list.description: This endpoint lists weekly or daily top artists at any time and in any country.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Time span. Defaults to `weekly`.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: `global` or region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/v1/chart/artists/top"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Daily Viral Tracks
api_list.description: This endpoint lists daily viral tracks at any time and in any country.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: `global` or region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.

api_list.code:

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Top Tracks
api_list.description: This endpoint lists weekly or daily top tracks at any time and in any country.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: `global` or region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2, e.g., `US`). Defaults to `global`.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Time span. Defaults to `weekly`.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format. Leave blank to get the latest chart.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/v1/chart/tracks/top"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: List Podcast Episodes
api_list.description: This endpoint lists all episodes of a podcast.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `100`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

api_list.name: Get Podcast Metadata
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a podcast.

api_list.name: Get Episode (Downloadable Audio)
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of an episode. Downloadable URL of full audio is available for **some** of the episodes.

api_list.name: List User Followers
api_list.description: This endpoint lists part of a user's followers.

api_list.name: List Playlist Tracks and Episodes
api_list.description: This endpoint lists tracks and episodes in a playlist.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `100`.

api_list.name: List Album Tracks
api_list.description: This endpoint lists tracks of an album. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned per request. Defaults to `300`.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

api_list.name: Get Album Metadata
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of an album.

api_list.name: Get Home Page Overview
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches trending information displayed on the Spotify home page as an incognito visitor.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to `US`. Unsupported code will **fallback** to `US`.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/v1/home"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
